items.title: Georgia prosecutor moves to drop case against Trump and allies over 2020 election
items.description: President Trump and more than a dozen of his allies were charged with offenses in Georgia relating to the 2020 presidential election.

items.title: Will a HELOC or home equity loan be better in 2026? Lending experts weigh in
items.description: Both products provide financing with traditionally low rates, but there are unique benefits and downsides to both.

items.title: Campbell Soup executive made offensive customer remarks, lawsuit claims
items.description: The complaint alleges that a Campbell executive made offensive remarks about company workers and mocked customers.
